title: Rounded typeface needed.
content:
Hello all,

I am looking for a typeface for a church logo/re-brand.

The church is called "New Life" and I am looking for a typeface that is rounded and looks good as lower case. I have had a look through various font sites without much success, and I refuse to resort to something like Comic Sans.

I basically need a modern, san serif, rounded typeface that does not look like it is drawn.

Attached is the general feel of the logo so far.

Any ideas would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014103805im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NewLifeLogo_6111.jpg)
author: The White Lion

comments.content:
[This thread on Gotham Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014103805/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30508) mentions a few other rounded sans serifs that have been popular of late, like Bryant and Omnes.

It may also help to look up the keywords ["rounded"](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014103805/http:/www.myfonts.com/browse/keyword/rounded/) or ["geometric"](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014103805/http:/www.myfonts.com/browse/keyword/geometric/) on MyFonts.

Brilliant.

Thank you cpalmieri and Jongseong!

I think I am going to go with Gotham Rounded in the end, seems to fit best to me.
